name: Virginia - Engagement Ring Mounting
description:
An intricate aspen leaf pattern ring designed to hold the diamond or gemstone of your choice. The overlapping leaves face alternate directions and are joined by diamond circles at east, west, and south. Pricing reflects mounting only. Center gemstone sold separately Pictured: 14k Palladium White Gold + Palladium Bezel + .65ct FVS2 Diamond: $3525 details - 3.5mm wide -.02ct accent diamonds available precious metals: -14k or 18k yellow gold, palladium white gold, or rose gold -palladium suggested gems: -diamond -sapphire -ruby -rose cut diamond (white, black, natural color opaque) Each bridal item is handcrafted to your specifications and typically takes 3-4 weeks for completion before shipping. Should you need this ring by a specific date please contact me for a detailed timeline and shipping options.

Pricing reflects mounting only. Center gemstone sold separately
